summary: Offers utilities for converting token sequences to and from text, managing vocabulary lookups, unknown token handling, and applying post‑processing steps to produce clean, language‑appropriate output for the SeamlessM4T multilingual model.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of the SeamlessM4T translation system by providing straightforward conversion between model token IDs and human‑readable strings, improving usability in multilingual translation and speech applications.
